generated.css: :root{--whiteText:rgb(247,247,247);font-family:'Open Sans',sans-serif;font-family:'Amiko',sans-serif;font-family:'Hind Guntur',sans-serif;--green:#82A888;--blue:#3468B2;--blackish:rgb(52,52,52);--greyish:rgb(89,89,89)}*{box-sizing:border-box;overflow-x:hidden;font-family:'Hind Guntur',sans-serif}body{margin:0}.downloads{padding-bottom:7vh}.downloads h2,h1{font-family:'Open Sans',sans-serif;font-size:2.5rem;padding-top:1.5rem;padding-left:10vw;color:var(--greyish)}.download-grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr;grid-row:auto;padding:2rem 8vw;gap:2rem}.download-grid-item{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center}.download-grid-item a{text-decoration:none;color:var(--blackish);text-align:center}.download-grid-item h2{font-family:'Amiko',sans-serif;font-size:1.5rem;color:var(--blackish);padding:0;margin:0}.download-grid-item p{color:var(--greyish);font-size:.8rem;margin:0}.download-grid-item svg{height:5em;width:5em;color:var(--blue)}.download-grid-item svg:hover{color:var(--green)}#sunnyLink{color:var(--blue);font-weight:500}#sunnLink:hover{color:var(--green)}@media screen and (max-width:1100px){.downloads{padding-bottom:7vh}.downloads h2,h1{font-size:2.5rem;padding-top:1.5rem;padding-left:10vw}.download-grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr;grid-row:auto;gap:2rem}.download-grid-item h2{font-size:1.5rem;padding:0}}@media screen and (max-width:800px){.downloads{padding-bottom:7vh}.downloads h2,h1{font-size:2.5rem;padding-top:1.5rem;padding-left:10vw}.download-grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;grid-row:auto;gap:2rem}.download-grid-item h2{font-size:1.5rem;padding:0}}@media screen and (max-width:600px){.downloads{padding-bottom:7vh}.downloads h2,h1{font-size:2.5rem;padding-top:1.5rem;padding-left:10vw}.download-grid{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr;grid-row:auto;gap:4rem}.download-grid-item h2{font-size:1.5rem;padding:0}}
